title: Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial: Park Home
body: "As pure a son of liberty, as I have ever known..." - Thomas Jefferson  Visit the house where wounded Polish freedom fighter Thaddeus Kosciuszko lived and hear how this brilliant military engineer designed successful fortifications during the American Revolution. See the room where he received notable visitors such as Chief Little Turtle and Thomas Jefferson.Â                Visiting Hours   The site is open on weekends only, April through October.
